page.title: 02A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: I woke at 1/4 to 7. Mum & Dad weren't awake so I had a snooze. When Dad had a wash I got in his place. Mum said, 'Keep still!' I had a chat with Dad about school. He went to make the tea, Mum got up & I had the bed to myself till 7.30. After breakfast I got my lunchbox. Mum put my bunches in... At school I waited for Kate but she only came after the 2nd whistle. After reg- ister, in assembly, Mr Smith gave out swimming tapes. We did hard Maths off the blackboard, & played{Please Mr {Crocodile}at break for{Domesday.}Kate fell over, she went to Miss & had some cream on. After lunch, I showed every- one my swimming.We were late for play. Then I had to describe a{playground {game, 1-2-3-Handstand.}Mrs Wickes read out from Amy's history book about the {Old Domesday book}... In the evening I watched East Enders & Give us a Clue.
